The '''Temple of the Graces''' is a religious building in the city of [[Meereen]]. Following the dictates of [[Ghiscari]] religion, noble Meereenese citizens may be buried within the temple after the proper funeral rites are observed.<ref>"[[The Laws of Gods and Men]]"</ref>
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Meereenese Temple of the Graces is a huge structure topped with golden domes. It lies to the west of the [[Great Pyramid]]. It is named after the [[Graces]], the priestesses of the Ghiscari religion who dwell there.

There is another Temple of the Graces in [[Astapor]], and presumably there are similar Temples in [[Yunkai]] and [[New Ghis]].
